group_1.narration: When I began investigating the [textBlue:Rumors],@Mitama, the Coordinator, introduced me to a@Chinese restaurant called Banbanzai.
Tsuruno, who was there, was so cheerful@straight from the first time I met her,
that I couldn't imagine back then@that she actually carried lots of sorrow under her smile.
The three of us, Tsuruno, Yachiyo, and I,@first set out to investigate@the Rumor of the SÃ©ance Shrine.
It was a [textBlue:Rumor] about being able to meet@the person you want to meet, and just as the [textBlue:Rumor] went,@I actually did meet Ui.
However, that Ui was a fake...
Not only was I shocked to see a fake,@but so was Yachiyo.
I couldn't bear watching Yachiyo suffer,@so I used the Grief Seed I had@on her rapidly clouding Soul Gem.
At this time, however,@I didn't notice the state of my own Soul Gem.
In the same shock, my Soul Gem had also been clouded.
...That day, before I even knew it,@I had released my Doppel...
In my fading consciousness, all I remember@is that I felt so cold that I thought I was going to die,@but I have no memory of what happened after that.
...when I found out later what it was like,@it sent a chill down my spine,
but I know I was right@to use the Grief Seed on Yachiyo at that moment.
Then, while investigating other [textBlue:Rumors],@I met Felicia.
She was still a mercenary at the time,@and I was shocked when she asked for money.
But I wanted to support her,@who said her parents were killed by a Witch.
Though, Felicia went away with@a mysterious organization called the "Wings of Magius"@which aims to liberate Magical Girls.
Following her, what we witnessed@was an extraordinary scene of Magical Girls raising Witches.
They were a dangerous group of people@who would do anything to achieve their goals.
When Felicia found out,@she left the Wings of Magius,@but at the same time, she was leaving us as well.
I may not understand how it feels to have your family killed,@but having lost Ui, I do know how lonely it feels@to have your family gone.
That's why I wanted to stay at Felicia's side.
After that, I moved to Kamihama City@and began attending a new school.
I became the odd girl out at school again, but...
Since I started living at Mikazuki Villa,@I've felt like even someone like me now has a place to belong,@and that I'm not alone anymore.
I think it was around this time that I started to step forward,@little by little, after always taking a step back.
Part of it was for Ui's sake, but I think@my own self has also changed through meeting everyone@and spending time together with them like this.
